agreement.title: [Required] Consent to the Collection and Use of Personal Information
agreement.content:
1. Items of Personal Information Collected
- Name, email address, password, mobile phone number

2. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information
- Membership registration and identity verification
- Provision of services and user identification
- Customer support and handling inquiries/complaints
- Delivery of notices

3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
- We retain your information until you delete your account or until the purposes of collection and use are fulfilled, and it may be retained for a certain period as required by applicable laws.

4. Right to Refuse Consent and Possible Disadvantages
- You have the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information.
- However, refusal may restrict membership registration and the use of the service.
agreement.readAndAgree: I have fully read and understood the above and agree to the collection and use of my personal information.
